Name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
Traits: aggressive, confident, energetic, idealistic, intimidating, uncompromising, lucky
Compatibility: Thrives with strong, patient partners who encourage ideals yet temper intensity.
Description: Aggressive, confident, and intensely driven. Idealistic leaders with intimidating presence, gifted and often lucky, but uncompromising when chasing goals.

Name: Hammerhead Shark
Traits: independent, adventurous, impulsive, restless, blunt, impatient
Compatibility: Best with freedom-loving partners who embrace adventure and avoid routine.
Description: Independent, restless, and adventure-obsessed. Impulsive and blunt, always moving forward and allergic to routine.

Name: Gorilla
Traits: outgoing, energetic, confident, witty, pioneering, distractible, curious
Compatibility: Needs supportive partners who help focus and finish what they start.
Description: Outgoing, energetic, and pioneering. Confident and witty yet easily distracted; shines when finishing what they start.

Name: Hippopotamus
Traits: patient, determined, sweet, forceful, balanced, steadfast
Compatibility: Stable, patient partners who appreciate persistence and calm their impulses.
Description: Sweet and docile on the surface, forceful when pushed. Patient and determined, balancing Aries’ impulsivity with steady persistence.

Name: Llama
Traits: misunderstood, adventurous, comfort-seeking, cautious, pessimistic, growth-focused
Compatibility: Balanced, patient partners who ground anxiety and resist spoiling.
Description: Misunderstood adventurers torn between excitement and comfort. Powerful when balanced; must resist being spoiled to meet life's challenges.

Name: Piranha
Traits: fearless, risk-taking, competitive, energetic, confident, decisive
Compatibility: Matches with ambitious risk-takers; partners must respect drive and independence.
Description: Fearless competitors hungry for the next challenge. Risk-taking, energetic, and decisive, with survivalist instincts and strong confidence.

Name: Goldfinch
Traits: confident, charismatic, outspoken, energetic, social, bold
Compatibility: Compatible with social, confident mates who accept blunt honesty.
Description: Bright, charismatic, and self-assured. Outspoken and energetic; polarizing to some but thrives socially and expects results.

Name: Praying Mantis
Traits: charming, mysterious, strategic, elegant, cautious, unforgiving
Compatibility: Works with trusting, composed partners who value discretion and strategy.
Description: Charming, mysterious, and strategic. Elegant and cautious, less forgiving than other Aries and prefers controlled, calculated moves.

Name: Rhinoceros
Traits: fearless, intense, rebellious, quick-tempered, magnetic, stubborn
Compatibility: Strong-willed partners who can handle intensity and share humanitarian values.
Description: Fearless, intense rebels with quick tempers. Magnetic and stubborn, humanitarian streak and a never‑give‑up attitude.

Name: Doberman Pinscher
Traits: loyal, sincere, protective, anxious, emotionally sensitive, candid
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners; avoid volatile, critical types.
Description: Loyal and sincere Aries with Dog’s warmth. Protective and candid, but more emotionally sensitive than most Aries.

Name: Dodo
Traits: friendly, generous, optimistic, naive, trusting, playful
Compatibility: Thrives with kind, grounded partners; watch out for manipulators.
Description: Friendly optimist with big heart. Trusting and playful; Pig’s sweetness softens Aries’ rough edges.

Name: Catfish
Traits: independent, optimistic, sincere, creative, intelligent, insecure
Compatibility: Pairs with encouraging, patient partners; avoid harsh critics and chaos.
Description: Contradictory blend of Aries confidence and Sheep elegance. Creative and sincere, yet sensitive to insecurity.

Name: Seagull
Traits: loyal, practical, protective, emotionally sensitive, traditional, sincere
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners; challenged by volatile or aloof types.
Description: Loyal realist with a protective streak. Traditional, sincere, and emotionally sensitive yet dependable.

Name: Rattlesnake
Traits: charismatic, bold, romantic, strategic, stubborn, self-assured
Compatibility: Drawn to confident yet supportive partners; clashes with controlling egos.
Description: Charismatic and bold with a romantic streak. Strategic and stubborn, keeps Taurus from timid following.

Name: Kangaroo
Traits: sturdy, adventurous, independent, decisive, grounded, straightforward
Compatibility: Works with adventurous yet grounded partners; struggles with indecisive or clingy types.
Description: Sturdy and independent adventurer. Decisive and grounded, prefers straightforward paths and freedom.

Name: Ostrich
Traits: clever, adaptable, optimistic, charming, steady, practical
Compatibility: Thrives with flexible, upbeat allies; dislikes pessimists and nitpickers.
Description: Clever, adaptable, and optimistic. Charming steadiness meets practical Taurus sensibility.

Name: Yak
Traits: dependable, persistent, stubborn, hardworking, resilient, patient
Compatibility: Best with patient, dependable partners; friction with impulsive risk‑takers.
Description: Rock‑solid and persistent. Stubborn, hardworking, and resilient; a reliable builder of long-term security.

Name: Wombat
Traits: warm, indulgent, generous, grounded, pleasure-seeking, loyal
Compatibility: Warm matches with affectionate, stable partners; avoid jealous or rigid types.
Description: Cozy, generous homebody who loves comfort and good company. Grounded yet indulgent.

Name: Hedgehog
Traits: artistic, polite, gentle, cautious, peace-seeking, sensitive
Compatibility: Compatible with gentle creatives; tense with confrontational personalities.
Description: Artistic and well‑mannered. Gentle, cautious, and peace‑seeking; struggles with tense, high‑pressure situations.

Name: Squirrel
Traits: energetic, curious, resourceful, imaginative, determined, quick
Compatibility: Pairs with curious go‑getters; conflicts with lazy or domineering types.
Description: Energetic, curious, and resourceful. Imaginative planner with determined follow‑through.

Name: Beaver
Traits: organized, persistent, eccentric, romantic, industrious, perfectionist
Compatibility: Prefers organized, loyal partners; uneasy with chaotic or flakey types.
Description: Industrious builder with eccentric charm. Persistent, romantic, and highly organized.

Name: Jackal
Traits: graceful, instinctive, charming, funny, mysterious, possessive
Compatibility: Magnetic with confident, respectful partners; trouble with possessive or secretive types.
Description: Graceful, instinctive charmer with a mysterious vibe. Funny yet possessive; self‑indulgent tendencies.

Name: Wolf
Traits: rebellious, passionate, independent, protective, unwavering, adventurous
Compatibility: Strong with loyal, supportive partners; combustible with controlling rivals.
Description: Passionate, determined, and protective. Independent rebel who seeks both security and adventure.

Name: Buffalo
Traits: patient, nurturing, reliable, comfort-loving, steady, compassionate
Compatibility: Harmonizes with caring homebodies; strains with restless thrill‑seekers.
Description: Patient, nurturing provider who values comfort and stability. Reliable and steady-hearted.

Name: Deer
Traits: friendly, loyal, curious, humanitarian, nervous, restless
Compatibility: Best with calm, supportive partners; avoid high-drama or controlling types.
Description: Friendly, loyal, and intensely curious. Humanitarian streak with a restless edge; sensitive to tension.

Name: Hummingbird
Traits: feisty, tenacious, proud, energetic, outspoken, imaginative
Compatibility: Thrives with confident but humble partners; clashes with arrogant egos.
Description: Feisty and tenacious communicators. Dragon’s pride adds leadership and ambition; can seem arrogant when unchecked.

Name: Great White Shark
Traits: hyper-energetic, restless, humorous, outgoing, impulsive, experience-seeking
Compatibility: Works with adventurous, flexible partners; struggles with routine or clinginess.
Description: Never stops moving. Restless, funny, and outgoing; constantly chasing the next big experience.

Name: Seal
Traits: curious, witty, funny, sociable, playful, easily bored
Compatibility: Pairs with clever, upbeat partners; avoid dull or rigid personalities.
Description: Curious, witty, and hilarious. Loves puzzles and people; needs variety and fun to stay engaged.

Name: Coyote
Traits: independent, adaptable, conflicted, practical, determined, observant
Compatibility: Best with patient, steady partners; friction with impulsive risk‑takers.
Description: Independent but conflicted. Practical and determined; balances Gemini’s flexibility with Ox’s steadiness.

Name: Cricket
Traits: friendly, impulsive, eccentric, charming, affectionate, witty
Compatibility: Compatible with warm, playful partners; avoid jealous or possessive types.
Description: Friendly, impulsive original. Pig’s warmth adds affection to Gemini’s witty charm and social buzz.

Name: Toucan
Traits: artistic, sensitive, tasteful, gentle, sympathetic, creative
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle creatives; tense with confrontational personalities.
Description: Artistic, sensitive tastemaker. Gentle and sympathetic; prefers harmony and beauty to conflict.

Name: Chipmunk
Traits: observant, independent, ambitious, aggressive, quick, high-strung
Compatibility: Pairs with focused, respectful partners; avoid chaotic or domineering types.
Description: Observant self-starter with sharp instincts. Ambitious, aggressive, and quick—prone to stress when overextended.

Name: Parrot
Traits: loud, proud, boisterous, self-assured, outspoken, opinionated
Compatibility: Best with confident but considerate partners; polarizes fragile egos.
Description: Bold, boisterous communicator. Loud and self-assured; speaks their mind with flair and conviction.

Name: Lemur
Traits: talkative, cerebral, seductive, charming, strategic, persuasive
Compatibility: Works with trusting, composed partners who value wit and subtlety.
Description: Silver‑tongued strategist. Seductive charm and cerebral wit make them masters of persuasive conversation.

Name: Chimpanzee
Traits: social, outspoken, rebellious, independent, unpredictable, intense
Compatibility: Strong with brave, principled partners; volatile with controlling rivals.
Description: Strongly social and outspoken. Rebel energy meets Gemini voice—unpredictable, intense, and potentially world‑changing.

Name: Centipede
Traits: quiet, observant, calm, elegant, creative, sensitive
Compatibility: Fits with gentle, patient partners; avoid loud, domineering personalities.
Description: Quiet observer with elegant calm. Creative and sensitive; prefers listening over leading.

Name: Pit Bull
Traits: loyal, dependable, traditional, protective, selfless, emotionally sensitive
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners; avoid volatile, critical types.
Description: Among the most loyal and dependable Cancers. Traditional and protective, often sacrificing personal happiness for loved ones and honor.

Name: Hornet
Traits: confident, proud, entitled, noble, self-respecting, powerful
Compatibility: Thrives with honest partners who help balance pride and emotion.
Description: Dragon adds pride and self-respect to fragile Cancer. Potentially very powerful when emotions are kept in check and honesty prevails.

Name: Hermit Crab
Traits: honest, open-minded, independent, restless, migratory, late to settle
Compatibility: Works with honest partners who value independence and stability.
Description: A good combination when balanced: Horse brings honesty and openness; Cancer tames the wild side. Often moves from place to place before settling.

Name: Emperor Tamarin
Traits: outgoing, self-confident, curious, restless, popular, analytical
Compatibility: Pairs with upbeat partners who help rein in overthinking.
Description: Among the most outgoing Cancers with less concern for others’ opinions. Restless curiosity can lead to dissatisfaction if not kept in check.

Name: Black Bear
Traits: solitary, dependable, perseverant, protective of stability, emotionally reserved
Compatibility: Best with patient partners who respect the need for security.
Description: Invests energy in a select few. Values stability and security; rarely shares deep emotions though serves as a rock for others.

Name: Lobster
Traits: caring, loving, self‑sacrificing, optimistic, gentle, warm
Compatibility: Compatible with warm, affectionate partners who reciprocate care.
Description: Deeply caring and often self‑sacrificing. Pig’s influence keeps outlook optimistic while Cancer’s nurturing nature shines.

Name: Seahorse
Traits: driven, risk‑prone, emotionally reserved, goal‑focused, perceptive, strategic
Compatibility: Needs partners who encourage healthy emotional expression and balance ambition.
Description: Tends to bury feelings and chase external goals. Rat’s judgment and perception provide balance to Cancer’s inward complexity.

Name: Iguana
Traits: self‑assured, organized, proud, sensitive, emotionally contradictory, praise‑seeking
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who temper perfectionism and mood swings.
Description: Rooster’s influence can conflict with Cancer’s natural state, creating emotional contradictions. Loves praise but is easily offended—adorable yet controversial.

Name: Snail
Traits: intuitive, possibly psychic, witty, charming, solitary, emotionally intense
Compatibility: Pairs with grounding partners who help regulate strong emotions.
Description: Highly intuitive and charming yet prone to loneliness. Can manipulate others’ emotions better than regulating their own; must keep thoughts in check.

Name: Duck
Traits: dependable, nurturing, insecure, gentle, comfort‑seeking, solitary
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle, supportive homebodies; struggles with loud or domineering types.
Description: Sheep intensifies Cancer’s dependability and insecurity and deepens the tendency toward solitude. Caring providers who value comfort and stability.

Name: Vampire Bat
Traits: unpredictable, outspoken, intense, principled, confident, emotionally volatile
Compatibility: Strong with brave, principled partners; combustible with controlling rivals.
Description: Contradictory yet sincere defenders of their beliefs. Tiger brings confidence and purpose, but also intensifies Cancer’s emotional volatility.

Name: Turtle
Traits: caring, loving, reserved, self‑doubting, home‑oriented, sensitive
Compatibility: Best with patient, encouraging partners; avoid harsh critics and chaos.
Description: Quiet, home‑oriented caretakers who hide in their shell when unsafe. Rabbit adds love of life but can increase withdrawal or depression.

Name: Shih Tzu
Traits: traditional, just, loyal, anxious, emotionally sensitive, protective
Compatibility: Works with steady partners who help stabilize emotions.
Description: More traditional than other Leos with a strong sense of justice. Loyal and protective but less socially adept; emotionally sensitive and candid.

Name: Orca
Traits: prideful, self‑assured, feisty, dramatic, at risk of self‑delusion
Compatibility: Best with humble, accountable partners who keep egos in check.
Description: The most prideful of Leos. Dragon intensifies self‑assurance and dramatics, risking self‑delusion and lack of personal responsibility if unchecked.

Name: Hyena
Traits: energetic, ambitious, independent, witty, gregarious, self‑centering risk
Compatibility: Pairs with empathetic partners who balance drive with humility.
Description: Constantly on the go; the most energetic and ambitious of Leos. Highly independent and social, but can become self‑centered if Horse dominates.

Name: Ferret
Traits: clever, curious, charming, achievement‑oriented, restless, puzzle‑loving
Compatibility: Thrives with partners who help focus efforts and follow through.
Description: Intelligent charmers who revel in accomplishments. Curious and ambitious, often moving from job to job or relationship to relationship.

Name: Sun Bear
Traits: stubborn, tireless, dependable, loyal, prideful, less social
Compatibility: Best with patient partners who respect independence and pride.
Description: Much less social than other Leos but more stubborn. Tireless and dependable; pride can make asking for help difficult.

Name: Quetzal
Traits: warm, indulgent, charming, vulnerable, romantic, generous
Compatibility: Compatible with caring, grounded partners; avoid manipulative types.
Description: Among the most vulnerable of prideful Leos. Warm and generous, seeking affection and comfort while maintaining Leo charm.

Name: Otter
Traits: clever, lively, curious, social, opportunistic, talkative
Compatibility: Pairs with fun‑loving partners who embrace wit and adventure.
Description: Clever, lively communicators with quick instincts. Social and opportunistic, they bring playful energy and curiosity to Leo’s flair.

Name: Peacock
Traits: self‑assured, precise, organized, proud, perfectionist, outspoken
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who temper bossiness and arrogance.
Description: Hands‑down the most self‑assured Leos. More precise and organized; Rooster boosts confidence but risks bossy, arrogant perfectionism.

Name: Fox
Traits: clever, funny, mysterious, dramatic, charming, persuasive
Compatibility: Works with grounded partners who indulge theatrics without enabling exaggeration.
Description: Clever, funny storytellers with an air of mystery. Leo’s love of drama meets Snake’s manipulation—boring tales become epics with irresistible flair.

Name: Wolverine
Traits: rebellious, unpredictable, intense, outspoken, quick‑tempered, magnetic
Compatibility: Strong with brave, principled partners; volatile with controlling rivals.
Description: The most rebellious and unpredictable of Leos. Natural leaders with good hearts and strong work ethics; intense and outspoken.

Name: Swan
Traits: elegant, romantic, calm, lucky, slightly lazy, gentle
Compatibility: Pairs with motivating partners who add structure and momentum.
Description: A bit lazier than other Leos but luckier than most. Elegant, romantic, and calm with a gentle heart and taste for beauty.

Name: Angora Rabbit
Traits: artistic, stylish, creative, sensitive, warm, tasteful
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle creatives; tense with confrontational personalities.
Description: Artistic Leos with heightened talent and taste for beauty. Warm, stylish, and creative; sensitivity prefers harmony over conflict.

Name: Salamander
Traits: helpful, giving, faithful, sincere, sensitive, socially anxious
Compatibility: Best with warm, empathetic partners; avoid harsh or critical types.
Description: Helpful and sincere caretakers with nervous energy. Sensitive in social situations yet faithful and giving; Dog’s warmth inspires confidence.

Name: Polar Bear
Traits: confident, proud, perfectionist, analytical, noble, self‑assured
Compatibility: Works with grounded partners who temper perfectionism and indecision.
Description: Dragon adds dynamic confidence and pride to analytical Virgo. Capable of great things if inflexible perfectionism and indecision are kept in check.

Name: Giraffe
Traits: creative, independent, forward‑looking, individualistic, occasionally hot‑tempered
Compatibility: Pairs with patient partners who embrace individuality and calm restlessness.
Description: True individuals who make great use of creativity. Horse looks forward while Virgo looks back, keeping Giraffes open‑minded and independent.

Name: Penguin
Traits: vivacious, curious, clever, witty, social, playful
Compatibility: Best with structured partners who encourage follow‑through and balance analysis.
Description: Monkey brings clever wit and fun while enhancing Virgo’s intelligence. More vivacious and curious than most Virgos; complement each other when aligned.

Name: Sea Star
Traits: strong‑willed, perceptive, intelligent, dependable, systematic, determined
Compatibility: Thrives with steady partners who appreciate reliability and persistence.
Description: Ox brings tireless determination and systematic dependability Virgo needs. Sea Stars feel vulnerable but have all the tools necessary to succeed.

Name: Gazelle
Traits: easygoing, kind, refined, artistic, optimistic, occasionally naive
Compatibility: Compatible with gentle, supportive partners; avoid manipulative or chaotic types.
Description: Pig’s easygoing attitude relieves serious Virgo though naivety can frustrate. Graceful and refined with a kind, artistic nature.

Name: Mouse
Traits: expressive, risk‑taking, nervous, tense, charming, independent
Compatibility: Pairs with supportive partners who ease anxiety and temper ambition.
Description: More expressive and willing to take risks than other Virgos. Rat warms up Virgo’s personality but can become power hungry if unchecked.

Name: Corgi
Traits: analytical, observant, self‑assured, perfectionist, helpful, stylish
Compatibility: Works with considerate partners who temper perfectionism and indecision.
Description: Analytical helpers eager to contribute in unique ways. Rooster adds confidence and charisma, though perfectionism clashes with Virgo’s reflective nature.

Name: Jellyfish
Traits: mysterious, elusive, instinctive, cerebral, skeptical, emotionally controlled
Compatibility: Best with trustworthy partners who respect privacy and intellect.
Description: Snake’s subtle precision pairs with Virgo’s keen observation. Highly cerebral and skeptical yet controlled and instinctive.

Name: Flamingo
Traits: nurturing, creative, intelligent, artistic, charming, insecure
Compatibility: Flourishes with reassuring partners who help them decide and act.
Description: Among the most nurturing signs; Sheep brings charm and artistry but also insecurity. Can obsess over analysis before making decisions.

Name: Narwhal
Traits: rebellious, unpredictable, bold, intense, emotionally expressive, independent
Compatibility: Strong with brave partners who support independence; volatile with controlling types.
Description: With Tiger in the mix these Virgos are wildcards—bold, unpredictable, and expressive while retaining Virgo’s analytical core.

Name: Earthworm
Traits: deep‑thinking, sensitive, fragile yet resilient, beauty‑loving, indecisive
Compatibility: Best with patient encouragers who provide calm and optimism.
Description: Thoughtful and resilient with sensitive hearts. Rabbit adds appreciation of beauty and luck in money; the hardest task is making decisions.

Name: Crane
Traits: diplomatic, honest, caring, humanitarian, justice‑focused, occasionally emotionally unstable
Compatibility: Best with loyal, steady partners who provide emotional stability.
Description: Nobody cares about justice more than a Crane. Dog enhances Libra’s humanitarian nature and loyalty, though it can bring emotional instability.

Name: Porcupine
Traits: confident, noble, proud, stubborn, temperamental, perfectionist
Compatibility: Pairs with humble partners who curb entitlement and impossible standards.
Description: Capable of great things but must avoid feeling entitled or becoming such perfectionists that no one can live up to their standards.

Name: Goose
Traits: adventurous, independent, restless, impatient, quick‑tempered, creative
Compatibility: Works with patient partners who offer grounding and balance.
Description: More likely than other Libras to jump on adventure. Independent but can be restless and quick tempered; a creative sign that can see goals through.

Name: Axolotl
Traits: intellectual, observant, social, charming, humorous, outgoing
Compatibility: Best with structured partners who encourage finishing what they start.
Description: Monkey enhances Libra’s intellect and social skills while adding charm and humor. Can stick with a groove too long and struggle to finish projects.

Name: Elephant
Traits: stable, dependable, traditional, respectful, tireless, emotionally and financially steady
Compatibility: Thrives with steady partners who appreciate tradition and reliability.
Description: Ox brings emotional and financial stability, a tireless work ethic, and respect for traditions—qualities that suit Libra well.

Name: Marmot
Traits: peaceful, idealistic, innocent, likeable, comfort‑loving, occasionally naive
Compatibility: Compatible with gentle partners who keep drama low and reinforce boundaries.
Description: Pig enhances Libra’s peaceful idealism and likeable innocence but also brings naivety. Marmots love nice things and tend to be good with money.

Name: Vulture
Traits: future‑focused, strategic, perceptive, witty, curious, opportunistic
Compatibility: Works with partners who value planning, substance, and reciprocity.
Description: Keen observers who focus on the future and strategy. Rat adds sharpness and wit to Libra’s social grace.

Name: Ladybug
Traits: charming, mysterious, humorous, well‑mannered, independent, polished
Compatibility: Pairs with respectful partners who give space and appreciate subtlety.
Description: Snake brings charm, mystery, and humor while enhancing Libra’s good manners and desire for independence.

Name: Butterfly
Traits: warm, mannered, easygoing, stylish, occasionally pessimistic, superficially judgmental
Compatibility: Best with positive partners who encourage depth and optimism.
Description: Rabbit calms Libra’s restless need for new experiences and adds warmth and good manners. Butterflies can be pessimistic and judge superficially.

Name: Pelican
Traits: confident, socially radiant, determined, attention‑loving, romantic, self‑assured
Compatibility: Works with supportive partners who keep ego grounded and on course.
Description: Rooster adds confidence and social radiance. Pelicans love attention and flattery and are determined to become successful in whatever they pursue.

Name: Clownfish
Traits: sweet, childlike, stylish, appearance‑focused, insecure, hospitable
Compatibility: Compatible with reassuring partners who build self‑esteem and encourage self‑care.
Description: Appearances are highly important to Clownfish. Excellent hosts with charm and taste; must work on self‑esteem and putting themselves first sometimes.

Name: Tasmanian Devil
Traits: emotional, opinionated, unpredictable, bold, intense, outspoken
Compatibility: Strong with brave partners who support independence; volatile with controlling types.
Description: Tiger makes these Libras more likely to show their emotions and voice their opinions. A bold wildcard among Libras.

Name: Octopus
Traits: loyal, protective, sincere, intense, strategic, emotionally sensitive
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners; avoid volatile critics.
Description: Dog adds warmth and sincerity to intense Scorpio. Loyal protectors with strategic minds and strong emotional sensitivity.

Name: Jaguar
Traits: powerful, resourceful, proud, ambitious, perfectionist, charismatic
Compatibility: Works with humble, accountable partners who balance intensity.
Description: Dragon enhances Scorpio’s drive and perfectionism, creating powerful, charismatic personalities who demand excellence.

Name: Dragonfly
Traits: humorous, quick‑tempered, attention‑seeking, energetic, intense, self‑critical
Compatibility: Matches with patient partners who ground emotions and ego.
Description: Horse adds humor and restless energy but a quick temper and need for attention. Powerful individuals whose biggest obstacle is themselves.

Name: Raven
Traits: intelligent, innovative, curious, strategic, witty, skeptical
Compatibility: Thrives with clever, supportive partners who respect independence.
Description: Intelligence and innovation meet Scorpio’s strategy. Differences complement each other, producing sharp observers with problem‑solving flair.

Name: Platypus
Traits: determined, steadfast, practical, misunderstood, private, resilient
Compatibility: Best with patient partners who appreciate quiet strength and focus.
Description: Ox enhances Scorpio’s quest for greatness and steady persistence. Platypuses live in their own world and are often misunderstood.

Name: Squid
Traits: loving, caring, generous, confident, determined, protective
Compatibility: Compatible with warm, grounded partners; avoid manipulators.
Description: Pig brings a loving, caring side to Scorpio while adding determination and confidence to pursue goals.

Name: Koala
Traits: elegant, solitary, sensitive, tasteful, introspective, gentle
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle partners who respect space and calm.
Description: Like Scorpio, Rabbit is a loner but adds appreciation for elegance and beauty to balance Scorpio’s focus on power.

Name: Anaconda
Traits: perceptive, survivalist, resourceful, observant, nervous, intense
Compatibility: Works with calming partners who temper stress and intensity.
Description: Rat enhances Scorpio’s survival instincts and observational skills but also brings nervous energy. Anacondas are powerful, resourceful, and perceptive.

Name: Owl
Traits: determined, hardworking, confident, outspoken, observant, proud
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who keep ego in check.
Description: Rooster contributes determination, hard work, and confidence; Scorpio values expressiveness though Rooster’s arrogance can cause trouble.

Name: Anglerfish
Traits: charming, mysterious, manipulative, strategic, elegant, disciplined
Compatibility: Pairs with discreet partners who value subtlety and control.
Description: Snake brings charm and mystery to help Anglerfish achieve goals. Both agree on using strategy to gain power.

Name: Honey Badger
Traits: defiant, fearless, intense, rebellious, quick‑tempered, relentless
Compatibility: Strong with principled partners; volatile with controlling rivals.
Description: A defiant nature makes Honey Badgers formidable. Powerful and relentless personalities who refuse to back down.

Name: Panda
Traits: charming, artistic, introspective, gentle, sensitive, thoughtful
Compatibility: Compatible with reassuring partners who encourage self‑belief.
Description: Sheep brings a charming, artistic side and helps Scorpio get lost in thought. Each complements the other’s weaknesses.

Name: Golden Retriever
Traits: restless, idealistic, intelligent, sincere, humanitarian, emotionally unstable
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners who offer stability.
Description: Dog enhances Sagittarius’s restlessness, idealism, and intelligence but can bring emotional instability. Big‑hearted, loyal seekers of truth.

Name: Whale
Traits: proud, self‑assured, ambitious, dramatic, idealistic, noble
Compatibility: Best with humble partners who keep egos accountable.
Description: Dragon magnifies ambition, pride, and drama while energizing Sagittarius’s ideals. Big‑picture vision with a commanding presence.

Name: Dove
Traits: humorous, restless, independent, blunt, freedom‑loving, romantic
Compatibility: Pairs with adventurous partners who respect space and honesty.
Description: Doves add humor and restless independence. Horse’s energy amplifies Sagittarius’s love of freedom and candid nature.

Name: Roadrunner
Traits: quick, witty, playful, curious, opportunistic, sociable
Compatibility: Works with clever partners who embrace variety and momentum.
Description: Roadrunners are fast‑moving, witty explorers. Monkey adds humor and agility to Sagittarius’s adventurous curiosity.

Name: Raccoon
Traits: practical, resilient, determined, adaptable, observant, conflicted
Compatibility: Best with steady partners who provide structure and patience.
Description: Ox brings practical determination and resilience to Sagittarius. Raccoons adapt well but can feel conflicted between freedom and duty.

Name: Camel
Traits: sociable, people‑pleasing, generous, optimistic, indulgent, warm
Compatibility: Works with grounded partners who reinforce boundaries and focus.
Description: More sociable and people‑pleasing than other Sagittariuses. Warm and generous spirits who enjoy comfort yet aim high.

Name: Sugar Glider
Traits: charming, energetic, stylish, tasteful, cautious, lucky in money
Compatibility: Compatible with gentle partners who appreciate flair and patience.
Description: Sugar Gliders are charming, energetic, and well‑dressed. Rabbit forces Sagittarius to be more cautious in social situations; luck favors money matters.

Name: Skunk
Traits: resilient, persistent, clever, competitive, independent, spirited
Compatibility: Thrives with supportive partners who respect drive and grit.
Description: Skunks are resilient individuals who never give up. Rat adds quick instincts to Sagittarius’s optimism.

Name: Swordfish
Traits: big‑personality, confident, outspoken, optimistic, straightforward, proud
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who help balance ego and pace.
Description: Swordfish share dauntless optimism and straightforward conversation style with other Sagittariuses, carrying bigger personalities and presence.

Name: Tarantula
Traits: charming, instinctive, graceful, cautious, strategic, composed
Compatibility: Pairs with steady partners who encourage prudent risk‑taking.
Description: Snake brings charm, instinct, and grace while mitigating Sagittarius’s risk‑taking tendencies, producing composed strategists.

Name: Mongoose
Traits: rebellious, moody, brave, outspoken, independent, intense
Compatibility: Strong with principled partners; combustible with controlling types.
Description: Tiger adds rebelliousness and moodiness to Sagittarius, creating intense, outspoken individuals who fight for what they believe.

Name: Tortoise
Traits: peaceful, intelligent, creative, gentle, thoughtful, calm
Compatibility: Works with patient partners who value serenity and curiosity.
Description: Tortoises are more peaceful and intelligent than other Sagittariuses with a creative approach to life.

Name: Boxer
Traits: loyal, helpful, caring, sincere, anxious, emotionally sensitive
Compatibility: Best with steady, empathetic partners who offer stability.
Description: The Dog intensifies Capricorn’s loyalty, helpfulness, and caring nature, but also brings a tendency to be overly emotional and anxious. Sincere and protective, they do best with calm support.

Name: Eagle
Traits: proud, hard-working, ambitious, noble, self-confident, judgmental
Compatibility: Best with humble partners who encourage flexibility and reflection.
Description: Dragon adds a noble flair and tireless self-confidence to steadfast Capricorn, but can increase black-or-white judgment. Ambitious and hard working, they must avoid overpromising and overworking.

Name: Salmon
Traits: outgoing, energetic, restless, self-reliant, self-centered, independent
Compatibility: Works with adventurous yet grounded partners who help finish what they start.
Description: More outgoing and energetic than most Capricorns, Salmon love starting new projects and goals but are less likely to finish them. Self-reliant and restless, they thrive with structure and encouragement.

Name: Woodpecker
Traits: resourceful, inventive, witty, agile, strategic, curious
Compatibility: Thrives with flexible partners who support innovation within structure.
Description: Capricorn brings resourcefulness and perseverance while Monkey adds inventiveness and charm. Quick-thinking strategists who blend practicality with curiosity and a knack for clever solutions.

Name: Ant
Traits: patient, persistent, organized, hardworking, resilient, methodical
Compatibility: Best with diligent, supportive partners; friction with impulsive risk-takers.
Description: Disciplined builders who value order, teamwork, and long-term results. Methodical and resilient, Ants combine Capricorn’s ambition with Ox’s steady endurance and reliability.

Name: Spider
Traits: perfectionist, generous, loyal, warm, self-sacrificing, sensitive
Compatibility: Works with kind, grounded partners; avoid manipulative or exploitative types.
Description: Spiders are more likely to be perfectionists and to sacrifice personal happiness for others. Warm and loyal, they must balance duty with self-care to avoid burnout.

Name: Aardvark
Traits: observant, independent, cautious, private, expressive, strategic
Compatibility: Best with respectful partners who give space and encourage sharing.
Description: Aardvarks are more likely to keep their thoughts to themselves yet are also better at expressing them when ready. Quiet, determined planners who value privacy and precision.

Name: Weaver Finch
Traits: ambitious, sensitive, stressed, tasteful, gentle, detail-avoidant
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle, supportive partners; avoid chaotic environments.
Description: Ambitious yet sensitive, Weaver Finches struggle with stress and prefer to avoid messy details. Artistic and tasteful, they do best in calm, orderly surroundings.

Name: Bee
Traits: colorful, radiant, detail-oriented, organized, meticulous, self-assured
Compatibility: Best with confident yet considerate partners; ego clashes can arise with showy critics.
Description: Rooster brings colorful radiance and an increased ability to handle small details. Bees are efficient, productive, and proud of their tidy, well-planned work.

Name: Mole
Traits: elegant, well-mannered, thoughtful, team-oriented, trusting, reserved
Compatibility: Harmonizes with patient, collaborative partners who value trust and timing.
Description: Sheep helps Capricorn let go, work with a team, trust others more, and know when to cash out and start a new project. Moles are thinkers and often loners with quiet elegance.

Name: Alligator
Traits: clever, charming, graceful, strategic, composed, intense
Compatibility: Pairs with calm, strategic partners who appreciate discretion and timing.
Description: Clever Capricorns who can be charming and graceful. Composed strategists who balance ambition with subtlety and strong instincts.

Name: Komodo Dragon
Traits: resilient, intense, dedicated, unpredictable, volatile, rebellious
Compatibility: Strong with grounded, patient partners; combustible with controlling types.
Description: Komodo Dragons may be the least Capricorn-like of all Capricorns. They share resilience, intensity, and dedication but also bring unpredictable, volatile emotion and rebellious spirit.

Name: Chameleon
Traits: humanitarian, curious, idealistic, private, detail-conscious, dogmatic-prone
Compatibility: Best with patient partners who respect alone time and encourage flexible beliefs.
Description: Dog tempers Aquarius’s free-wheeling curiosity with care for details. Highly humanitarian and sincere, these Aquarians need solitude and should avoid becoming too dogmatic.

Name: Leopard
Traits: exuberant, opinionated, charismatic, confident, proud, leadership‑inclined
Compatibility: Thrives with humble partners who balance ego and keep focus on the greater good.
Description: Often de facto leaders, Leopards are among the more exuberant and opinionated Aquarians. Dragon boosts confidence and presence; they must avoid falling in love with their own ideas.

Name: Unicorn
Traits: eccentric, outspoken, energetic, standout, independent, restless
Compatibility: Pairs with adventurous partners who embrace individuality and pace.
Description: Standouts wherever they go, Unicorns tend to be among the more eccentric Aquarians and are more likely to voice their opinions openly and energetically.

Name: Dolphin
Traits: intellectually gifted, curious, imaginative, witty, playful, boredom‑averse
Compatibility: Thrives with stimulating partners who value curiosity and encourage service to others.
Description: Among the most intellectually gifted and curious signs. Mental stimulation is key; Monkey intensifies imaginative reasoning but can lessen interest in humanitarian pursuits.

Name: Walrus
Traits: quiet, reserved, patient, dependable, steadfast, practical
Compatibility: Best with steady partners who respect a calm pace and provide structure.
Description: Ox brings quiet reserve, patience, and steadiness to Aquarius. Practical and dependable, Walruses prefer structure and measured progress.

Name: Pufferfish
Traits: soft‑spoken, thoughtful, sociable, generous, warm, trusting
Compatibility: Works with kind, grounded partners; avoid manipulative or exploitative types.
Description: Pig adds sociability to thoughtful, soft‑spoken Aquarians. Warm and generous, Pufferfish enjoy people and benefit from supportive, grounded companions.

Name: Meerkat
Traits: imaginative, intellectual, problem‑solving, private, risk‑planning, stress‑prone
Compatibility: Pairs with respectful partners who help share ideas and manage stress.
Description: Big dreamers who share ideas less readily than other Aquarians. Meerkats enjoy solving problems and taking well‑planned risks, but are more prone to regular stress.

Name: Sloth
Traits: tasteful, beauty‑loving, gentle, sensitive, calm, low‑energy
Compatibility: Flourishes with gentle partners who provide structure, motivation, and harmony.
Description: A bit lazier than other Aquarians but with excellent taste and appreciation for beauty. Gentle, sensitive individuals who prefer calm and aesthetically pleasing environments.

Name: Bird-of-Paradise
Traits: colorful, confident, outgoing, self‑assured, intuitive, practical, arrogance‑prone
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who temper pride and the need for flattery.
Description: Bright, colorful standouts who command attention. Rooster adds intuition and practicality but can bring arrogance and a constant need for flattery.

Name: Handfish
Traits: creative, visionary, elegant, well‑mannered, self‑doubting, artistic
Compatibility: Works with reassuring partners who encourage self‑belief and help finish projects.
Description: Among the most creative signs with ideas often ahead of their time. Sheep brings artistic charm but also self‑doubt; Handfish love projects and work hard to be happy.

Name: Boa Constrictor
Traits: mysterious, graceful, well‑mannered, charming, romantic, jealousy‑prone, icy when hurt
Compatibility: Pairs with calm, strategic partners who value discretion and help avoid jealousy triggers.
Description: Less interested in humanitarian pursuits than other Aquarians, but among the most romantic, instinctive, and charming. Potential for jealousy and icy hostility when wronged.

Name: Panther
Traits: intense, rebellious, emotional, humanitarian, tough, idealistic
Compatibility: Strong with principled, grounded partners; combustible with controlling types.
Description: More intense and rebellious than other Aquarians. Often politically oriented and emotional; can drift into utopian thinking and feel dissociated without grounding.

Name: Lemming
Traits: clever, charming, emotional, influential, high‑strung, stress‑prone
Compatibility: Works with grounding partners who help manage stress and pace.
Description: Rat brings cleverness and charm to introverted Pisces; Lemmings are highly emotional and influential but tend to get high‑strung and stressed.

Name: Tarsier
Traits: honest, loyal, intelligent, humanitarian, escapist, sensitive
Compatibility: Best with supportive partners who promote healthy coping over escapism.
Description: Honest, loyal humanitarians who believe in the greater good; under stress Tarsiers can turn to escapism to avoid real‑life pressure.

Name: Firefly
Traits: optimistic, forceful, confident, social, progress‑driven, inspired
Compatibility: Thrives with upbeat partners who encourage momentum and social balance.
Description: Dragon’s optimism and forceful personality outweigh Pisces’ introversion when confidence rises; Fireflies need more social activity to balance energy and keep progress.

Name: Gecko
Traits: spontaneous, creative, open‑minded, excitable, unstable, adventurous
Compatibility: Pairs with calm partners who help channel excitement into completion.
Description: Horse brings excitement and spontaneity, enhancing creativity and open‑mindedness; Geckos can feel out of control but achieve greatly when letting go of worries.

Name: Cheetah
Traits: charming, outgoing, inventive, playful, distracted, unfinished‑prone
Compatibility: Works with structured partners who help focus and finish tasks.
Description: More charming and outgoing than most Pisces; innovative and playful, Cheetahs are easily distracted and rarely finish what they start.

Name: Moose
Traits: dependable, hardworking, dedicated, practical, romantic, stability‑seeking
Compatibility: Best with patient partners who balance security with creative freedom.
Description: Ox brings strong work ethic and task dedication; Pisces’ artistic side may feel stifled. Moose are sweet romantics who dream of luxury and creativity entwined.

Name: Silkworm
Traits: artistic, lucky, sensitive, brilliant, self‑doubting, depression‑prone
Compatibility: Thrives with encouraging partners who nurture confidence and expression.
Description: Rabbit adds artistry and good luck to Pisces’ imagination; Silkworms are prone to depression but can be brilliant when confident enough to express themselves honestly.

Name: Frog
Traits: elusive, mysterious, private, intuitive, complex, hard‑to‑define
Compatibility: Pairs with patient partners who respect privacy and gradual trust.
Description: One of the most difficult signs to explain; Frogs are elusive, mysterious, and only show what they want others to see.

Name: Stingray
Traits: moody, unpredictable, intense, humanitarian, passionate, rebellious
Compatibility: Strong with principled partners who provide grounding and calm.
Description: Stingrays are moody and unpredictable yet huge humanitarians at heart, blending intensity with compassion.

Name: Leafy Seadragon
Traits: artistic, elegant, sensitive, self‑doubting, visionary, gentle
Compatibility: Works with reassuring partners who provide stability and self‑belief.
Description: A sign of many tortured artists; Leafy Seadragons pair Pisces’ imagination with Sheep’s artistic charm, often battling self‑doubt.

Name: Ocelot
Traits: confident, self‑assured, independent, self‑focused, reserved, slow‑to‑warm
Compatibility: Best with considerate partners who avoid rushing and respect autonomy.
Description: Rooster brings confidence and a self‑centered streak; Ocelots often prefer solitude and like to do things their own way on their own time.

Name: Zebra
Traits: socially conscious, gentle, generous, chivalrous, naive, conflict‑averse
Compatibility: Thrives with kind partners who reinforce boundaries and practicality.
Description: Zebras are socially conscious and want to do things right; Pig enhances Pisces’ gentle generosity while adding chivalry and naivety. Artistic and intellectual, they avoid confrontation.
